column4: I have a printer with a built in memory card reader.  How do I mount the card?
looked all over for how to do that.  Plenty of advice on installing linux on usb cards but none on how to connect them in the first place.
Most USB cards 'just work', plug them in and they auto-mount, I am not sure about printer / memory card combos
I had this old sandisk reader that didn't used to work on linux.  Just for fun I plugged it in and stuff came right up.  What a difference a couple of years makes.
